Text:

I would suggest you find a new ISP. Comcast is noctorious for blocking torrents and threatening customers who download them with legal action.

http://wayofthegeek.org/2007/08/comcast-blocks-torrent-seeding/

http://arstechnica.com/news.ars/post/20071021-comcast-traffic-blocking-even-more-apps-groupware-clients-affected.html

http://www.cnet.com/8301-13739_1-9769645-46.html

If I were you, I would leave them and let them know why. They don't know why you are torrenting. For all they know you are a CEO trying to get valuable information to a client or employee, that is too large for email or fax! Torrents are not just for pirates. Comcast makes me sick!
